name: AMUSED Co
description: Developer of an online shopping platform intended to connect buyers and sellers looking for authenticated preowned luxury fashion. The company's platform is for preloved luxury fashion with a conscience where they provide an inventory of unique pieces; including handbags, shoes, accessories, and jewelry, with rare, discontinued, or limited edition pieces, enabling shoppers to access limited exclusive luxury items at a competitive cost.
